0.0: Words of Amos. A farmer from Takoa. 2 years before the earthquake.
0.1: Hashed calls out from Zion. Everything will dry up.
0.2: 3 sins of Damascus. 4th is over the line. Plowed up Gilead.
0.3: I (Hashem) will send a fire to the palaces
0.4: I will break the strength of Aram and send them into exile
0.5: 4th sin of Gaza was that they did not let the Jews escape from Edom. Hashem does not forgive them.
0.6: I (Hashem) will send a fire to Gaza
0.8: 4th sin of Tyre was not letting the Jews escape Edom. They remember the pact of the brothers.
0.10: 4th sin of Edom. The never-ending hatred of the Jews.
0.12: 4th sin of Ammon destroyed the child of Gilead

1.0: 4th sin of Moab. They burned the king of Edom's bones.
1.3: Judah is over the line. They're disgusted with the Torah. Falsehood led them astray.
1.4: Pyro trick: Hashem says he'll burn everyone
1.5: Israel is over the line. They sell righteous people for money and poor people for shoes.
1.6: Desire, dust of earth, heads of poor people, man and dad sleep with same women ewww….
1.7: They have stolen clothing near their alter
1.8: I (Hashem) destroyed the Emorites before you and they were really tough
1.9: I took you out of Egypt and took care of you in the desert for 40 years
1.10: I made your kids into prophets and Nazarites
1.11: You gave the Nazarites win and told the prophets "We don't want to hear it"
1.12: I will make you suffer like a wagon stuffers under its load
1.13: Fast people: no escape. Strong people: won't save themselves.

2.0: Here's a message for the Jewish people on how I took them out of Egypt
2.1: You're My people so I expect standards
2.2: Do 2 people get together without arranging beforehand?
2.3: Does a lion call out without catching prey?
2.4: Does a trap go up without catching something?
2.5: Does a Shofar blow without people being scared? Do bad things happen without ה׳ doing it?
2.6: If Hashem does something He tells the prophets first
2.7: If a lion roars who is not afraid? Hashem speaks how can you not prophesies?
2.11: When a shepherd find what's left of his sheep, ear feet, etc. That'll be you!

4.17: You all say that you want the day of Hashem? You can't handle the day of Hashem
4.18: Its like running from a lion and bumping into a bear then leaning on the wall and being bitten by a snake
4.19: It's so dark, no light at all
4.20: I (Hashem) hate your holidays (because they're fake)
4.21: Bring your offerings – I don't care!
4.24: Did you bring me offerings in the desert?
4.26: And go to exile to Demascus

6.0: Amos sees a vision: Locust eat the crops
6.1: Amos: Forgive the Jews, they're small
6.3: A ball of fire comes down and consumes everything
6.6: Vision number 3: Hashem has a plumb line
6.7: Hashem: I'm putting down a line for the Jews
6.8: Destroy houses of idolatry. Go after Jeroboam's house with a sword...
6.9: Amaziah the priest: Send a message to Jeroboam saying "Amos is rebelling against you"
6.10: Amos is saying that you'll die by the sword and Jews will be exiled
6.11: Amaziah says to Amos: Go back to Judah, eat bread and give prophesies
6.12: We don't want you here in the Kingdom of Israel! Go away!
6.13: Amos says, "I'm not a prophet, not the son of a prophet, I'm a hick with straw in my teeth"
6.14: Hashem took me from the sheep and told me to be a Prophet
6.15: You told me not be a Prophet
6.16: Your wife will cheat on you, your children will die and you'll die in exile

7.0: He sees a basket of figs
7.1: The end has come (play on words of קץ?)
7.2: Singing will be replaced with wailing, when they bury the corpses they'll be quiet
7.3: All you try to do is be mean to poor people
7.4: When will people enter my shop so I can rip them off
7.6: Hashem "You think I forgot? BIG MISTAKE!
7.7: Water should rise up and sweep you away
7.8: I will darken the day of light
7.9: I'll turn your holidays into mournings
7.10: I (Hashem) will bring a famine not for food or water but for the word of Hashem
7.11: People will search everywhere and not find the word of Hashem
7.13: All of you who swear falsely will fall and never get up

8.0: Amos sees Hashem on the Alter. Everything shakes. People die by the sword.
8.1: If you go down to the grave then I will take you from there. If you go to heaven I'll bring you down.
8.2: If you go into the depths I'll have a snake bite you
8.3: My eye is on you all for bad
8.4: I'll rise like a tidal wave
8.5: Hashem who is mighty in heaven and His creations are on Earth
